Issues

Goals

  1. Police Reform
    • Transparency of Police Budgets
    • How much is leadership spending on police?
    • Any excessive spending must be diverted to other public services (education, mental health response teams, etc.)
    • Demilitarize the Police Force
    • Immediately return all military equipment to the federal government
    • Police shootings are to be investigated by state or federal officialsL
    • Local police departments often investigate shootings by their own officers, undermining the impartiality of these investigations.
    • Create community review boards
    • BIPOC-led community boards, independent from the police, that hold institutional power in hiring and firing decisions.
  2. City Council
    • Attend all city council meetings and make public comments
    • Allow for live public comments
    • Allow for accessible live streams of city council meetings (like HB/Santa Ana meeting set up)
  3. Schools
    • Diversify our Narrative CUSD and SVUSD
  4. Mental Health and Wellness
    • Provide mental health and wellness resources for the community/be a space for BIPOC in South OC
